document.full_text: an arab militant reported to be al qaeda's top emissary to an islamist insurgency in russia's north caucasus region, has been killed by security officials, federal authorities said on friday.
document.title: russia says kills al qaeda militant in north caucasus
lines_and_colors: an arab militant reported to be al qaeda's top emissary to an islamist insurgency in russia's north caucasus region, has been killed by security officials, federal authorities said on friday.
